parameter.name: stations
parameter.description: Define the list of stations that are allowed to process. Fotmat: NET.STA

parameter.name: whiteChanns
parameter.description: Define the list of channles types that are allowed to process. Example: HH, CH

parameter.name: Pmodel
parameter.description: EQCCT model to detect P phases.

parameter.name: Smodel
parameter.description: EQCCT model to detect S phases.

parameter.name: windowLength
parameter.description: Define the data window length in seconds to send to eqcct.

parameter.name: probThreshold
parameter.description: Minimum probability to reach to send a new pick.

parameter.name: timeShift
parameter.description: Define the time in seconds to overlap with the previous window.

parameter.name: stasBulk
parameter.description: Number of stations to send at a time to eqcct.

parameter.name: startLatency
parameter.description: Define time in seconds to wait before sending the first data packet to eqcct.

parameter.name: timeRemoveTrace
parameter.description: Maximum time in seconds to wait before remove traces from the processing stream.

parameter.name: eqcctPthr
parameter.description: Minimum probability to reach to send a new P pick.

parameter.name: eqcctSthr
parameter.description: Minimum probability to reach to send a new S pick.

parameter.name: eqcctOverlap
parameter.description: If set the detection and picking are performed in overlapping windows.

parameter.name: eqcctBatchSize
parameter.description: Batch size. This wont affect the speed much but can affect the performance. A value beteen 200 to 1000 is recommended.

parameter.name: gpuID
parameter.description: Id of GPU used for the prediction. If using CPU set to None.

parameter.name: gpuLimit
parameter.description: Set the maximum percentage of memory usage for the GPU.

parameter.name: numCPUs
parameter.description: Number of CPUs allocated for running the run_picker() to create the time chunks.

parameter.name: maxTimeTasksQueue
parameter.description: Number of given time chunks that are sent to the predictor at the same time. If your time chunk length is equal to one this should be one as well.

parameter.name: maxStsTasksQueue
parameter.description: Number of given stations that are sent to the predictor at the same time. This value cannot be greater than eqcct.stasBulk.

parameter.name: latUncTHR
parameter.description: Set the latitude uncertainty threshold. Above this value, the origin evaluation status is FalseOrgEvalStat, and below is TrueOrgEvalStat.

parameter.name: lonUncTHR
parameter.description: Set the longitude uncertainty threshold. Above this value, the origin evaluation status is FalseOrgEvalStat, and below is TrueOrgEvalStat.

parameter.name: depthUncTHR
parameter.description: Set the depth uncertainty threshold. Above this value, the origin evaluation status is FalseOrgEvalStat, and below is TrueOrgEvalStat.

parameter.name: depthTHR
parameter.description: Set the depth threshold. Above this value, the origin evaluation status is FalseOrgEvalStat, and below is TrueOrgEvalStat.

parameter.name: azGapTHR
parameter.description: Set the azimuthal gap threshold. Above this value, the origin evaluation status is FalseOrgEvalStat, and below is TrueOrgEvalStat.

parameter.name: region
parameter.description: The BNA file defining regions (closed polygons) or tuple with 4 elements. Inside this region, the origin evaluation status is TrueOrgEvalStat, and outside is FalseOrgEvalStat. If this is set to none, then the origin location will not be checked against any polygon.

parameter.name: TrueOrgEvalStat
parameter.description: Set the origin evaluation status to use when the origin fulfills all quality thresholds. Use integers from 0 to 5. Each integer means following next list: 0=preliminary, 1=confirmed, 2=reviewed, 3=final, 4=rejected, 5=reported.

parameter.name: FalseOrgEvalStat
parameter.description: Set the origin evaluation status to use when the origin does not fulfill one or more quality thresholds. Use integers from 0 to 5. Each integer means following next list: 0=preliminary, 1=confirmed, 2=reviewed, 3=final, 4=rejected, 5=reported
